fields.name: Tech & Co Backpack
fields.description: The Tech & Co Backpack is a force to be reckoned with. It has an external padded, zipped laptop pocket that fits most 15 inch laptops. The front pocket is complete with a phone slot, pen slots and a clip to hang your keys on. All the zip pullers are designed so as you can get creative and easily attach your favourite bag charm. We've got your back.

fields.name: Tech & Co Mouse Pad
fields.description: Make your mouse super happy with our Typo mouse pads! They have amazing designs with a smooth surface that will ensure easy glide for your mouse. Our mouse pads are made from neoprene with a non-slip base.

fields.name: Tech & Co Notebook
fields.description: The notebook for the quintessential organiser. Separate your subjects and keep all of your notes, doodles, clippings and worksheets in the one fresh A5 sized notebook. In a range of seasonal prints and designs, these are a Typo signature stationery essential. You're welcome.

fields.name: Tech & Co Coffee Mug
fields.description: Our Anytime Mug is perfect for... you guessed it.. Anytime! A staple to drink your daily coffee out of.

fields.name: Avery Laptop Sleeve
fields.description: The Take Charge 13'3 inch laptop case is padded with 3mm foam and plush lining to keep your laptop super cosy. So compact and convenient you can literally work anywhere! Bring it on!

fields.name: Tech & Co Sienna Hoodie
fields.description: Our Basic Hoodie ticks all the right boxes. Soft brushed fleece. Drawstring at the neck. Kangaroo pocket for keeping your hands warm. What more could you want in a hoodie?!

fields.name: Tech & Co Mirabella Power Bank
fields.description: Ain't nobody got time for a flat phone! Have no fear, the Charge It will keep you charged and social media ready at all times.

fields.name: Tech & Co Gypsy USB Speakers
fields.description: Light up your life with Typo's LED Speaker! With two different mood lights and wireless music function, you will have the right setting for every situation!

fields.name: Tech & Co Super Cute Airpod Case
fields.description: At only 1.2mm slim, you can count on the CASETiFY AirPods Pro Case to keep your tech safe from drops, dirt and scratches. It's totally up to you. *AirPods and Charger are not included.

fields.name: Tech & Co Steminist T-Shirt
fields.description: Proudly wear your support and solidarity for women in STEM with the Steminist T-Shirt. It's soft and comfortable with a flattering modern fit.

fields.name: Tech & Co True Wireless Earbuds
fields.description: These True Wireless Earbuds allow you to enjoy music, podcasts, audiobooks and more on the go without the hindrance of cords, thanks to the Bluetooth 5.0 technology. It has 2.5 hours of play time plus a single microphone for handsfree calls. It comes with a charging case so you can keep it powered on your daily commute.

fields.name: Tech & Co Over the Moon Ear Phones
fields.description: These On-ear Headphones feature a 1.2 m cable and connect to your device with a 3.5 mm jack. They have a cushioned headband for comfort and can be folded compactly when not in use. They feature an in-line microphone and volume control so you can adjust the functions without reaching for your phone.
